pr_title: FM2-186: Add support for users as Practitioners

timeline.message: FM2-186: Add support for users as Practitioners

timeline.bodyText: We can actually probably get rid of this method since, to be consistent, it should be called get().
timeline.author: ibacher

timeline.bodyText: Ditto: just using get() in place of duplicating this method makes the most sense to me.
